price: ហើយនៅថ្ងៃនោះ មនុស្សលោក និងជិនមិនត្រូវគេសួរ អំពីបាបកម្មរបស់គេឡើយ។
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun walā jānnun
